document.full_text: a former foreman at a west virginia coal mine where an explosion killed 29 workers last year pleaded guilty on wednesday to lying to investigators about his job qualifications, the first plea in a federal probe of the blast.
document.title: ex-foreman at massey west virginia mine pleads guilty
lines_and_colors: a former foreman at a west virginia coal mine where an explosion killed 29 workers last year pleaded guilty on wednesday to lying to investigators about his job qualifications, the first plea in a federal probe of the blast.
